title: I heard hanging clothes in toilet is not allowed due to negative energy & Jinn being there? assim al
transcript: yes it says i heard somewhere that hanging clothes in the toilet is not permissible due to negative energy and gin being inhabiting such places is this true seriously negative energy what is this so if you hang your clothes outside in your uh gym for example or in your study would that mean that you will have positive energy all of this is nonsense we have nothing relating to such nonsense in islam it is no problem then whatsoever in hanging your clothes in the toilet at all you
